# Medial Temporal Lobe Volumes

## Path Models: Breastfeeding -> Satiety Responsiveness (mediated Hip) -> %BMI

### Left Hippocampus - percent of overweight cuttoff scaled to ratio (out of 1)

\FloatBarrier

```{r BF2SR_lHipMed_fit, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
kable(HippL_BF2SR_p85th_cov_summary$FIT[c(3:11, 16:21)], digits = 3, caption = "Fit Statistics for Model: BF -> SR (L Hipp Med) -> p85th BMI", booktabs=TRUE) 
```
\FloatBarrier

```{r BF2SR_lHipMed_PE, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
kable(HippL_BF2SR_p85th_cov_summary$PE[c(1:35), c(1:3, 6:9)], digits = 3, caption = "Parameters for Model: BF -> SR (L Hipp Med) -> p85th BMI", booktabs=TRUE)
```
\FloatBarrier

\clearpage
